RTCRtpEncodingParameters.summary: An instance of the WebRTC API's RTCRtpEncodingParameters dictionary describes a single configuration of a {{Glossary("codec")}} for an .

remarks.para: This dictionary is used to describe the configuration of an RTP sender's encodings when calling or .

- is used to describe the configuration of an RTP receiver's encodings.
